_sText:
furbhop: Reviens me voir quand t'auras une première map sur SJ
Traduction: Come back once you get an actual map of yours on sourcejump. 
I hope this one is ok to come back..

- Hello guys, this is my latest project that I have been working on, on and off for the last 6 months. The map is made with legit (scroll) bhop in mind (what every map should be). I went with a realistic style since it's what I prefer to do when I'm mapping. The difficulty of the map is just an old classic mp bhop that almost everyone can complete since it's easy and medium. There are also a lot of checkpoints, which gives the player a better experience. There is also 5-6 easter eggs in the map.

- This map couldn't have been completed without the help of those people. So thx alot again.
